parameters.name: YEAR
parameters.description: UTC year associated with the center time of the averaging interval for the magnetic field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: DAY_OF_YEAR
parameters.description: UTC day of year associated with the center time of the averaging interval for the magnetic field samples Bx,By,Bz in each record.

parameters.name: HOUR
parameters.description: UTC hour associated with the center time of the averaging interval for the magnetic field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: MINUTE
parameters.description: UTC minute associated with the center time of the averaging interval for the magnetic field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: SECOND
parameters.description: UTC second associated with the center time of the averaging interval for the magnetic field samples Bx, By, Bz in each record.

parameters.name: TIME_TAG
parameters.description: A derived value for the timetag associated with the center time of the averaging interval of the Bx,By,Bz samples in each record. The derived value is created by the following formula: MET + 0.05 * delta_ts + (dt_sample)*(I-1) - latency. MET is the mission elapsed time for the entire science packet. delta_ts is the delta time in seconds between the MET and the first sample in the downloaded science packet. dt_sample is the time between samples in seconds and given by dt_sample = 1/sample_rate where sample_rate is the reported sample rate in samples per second. I is the incremental counter for each data sample in the science packet. I=1 is the first sample in the packet. Latency is the sample rate-dependent delay of the time stamp recording relative to the actual time of observation.

parameters.name: NAVG
parameters.description: Number of samples in averaging interval.

parameters.name: X_MSO
parameters.description: Average X position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: Y_MSO
parameters.description: Average Y position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: Z_MSO
parameters.description: Average Z position in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of kilometers.

parameters.name: BX_MSO
parameters.description: Average X axis magnetic field value in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: BY_MSO
parameters.description: Average Y axis magnetic field value in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: BZ_MSO
parameters.description: Average Z axis magnetic field value in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates in units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: DBX_MSO
parameters.description: Standard deviation of X axis magnetic field values in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates and units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: DBY_MSO
parameters.description: Standard deviation of Y axis magnetic field values in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates and units of nano-Tesla.

parameters.name: DBZ_MSO
parameters.description: Standard deviation of Z axis magnetic field values in Mercury solar orbital (MSO) coordinates and units of nano-Tesla.
